mapper.insert: INSERT INTO distribution_history ( token, user_id_splashed, user_id_taken, allocated_money, is_completed, created_at, modified_at, expired_at ) VALUES ( #{token}, #{userIdSplashed}, #{userIdTaken}, #{allocatedMoney}, #{completed}, #{createdAt}, #{modifiedAt}, date_add(now(), interval 10 minute) )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id_splashed, distribution_no, is_completed, allocated_money FROM distribution_history where token = #{token} and is_completed ='false' limit 1
